entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 24. Humidex 27. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 23.
